body_html: We have implemented the Padé approximant for the matrix exponential entirely with TensorFlow ops and deprecated the op based on the Eigen C++ implementation. This allows for gradients and ops on GPU automatically. Commit here.
body_text: We have implemented the Padé approximant for the matrix exponential entirely with TensorFlow ops and deprecated the op based on the Eigen C++ implementation. This allows for gradients and ops on GPU automatically. Commit here.
body: We have implemented the Padé approximant for the matrix exponential entirely with TensorFlow ops and deprecated the op based on the Eigen C++ implementation. This allows for gradients and ops on GPU automatically. Commit [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/a4f755678102a4fb8861fec3238ddc78bb9b2a6e).
